channel.title: Hi, I'm David Renkert from thentic.com
channel.description:
I'm building [thentic][1] - a platform to help brick-and-mortar retailers in the natural food space educate employees about brands, products and industry issues.
I'm in Tahoe City, CA and started working on thentic about 4 years ago. Currently I'm focusing on growth.
[1]: http://www.thentic.com
